txt.en: Certain equipment, once used, cannot be traded to other players.  Note that you can 'try on' Bind-on-Equip items by CTRL-clicking, to use the Dressing Room.  Bind-on-Equip items tend to be more powerful than their regular counterparts, so be careful with these items.

Certain equipment, once used, cannot be traded to other players. Note that you can 'try on' Bind-on-Equip items by CTRL-clicking, to use the Dressing Room. Bind-on-Equip items tend to be more powerful than their regular counterparts, so be careful with these items.
